attributes.additional_details: The Government is looking to crack down on Alcohol abuse and making it more expensive isn't the answer, stop drinking in the streets , buses, tubes , trains etc ! Consuming Alcohol should be in Licenced premises and home only !!! Are you fed up with seeing 'kids' walking the streets with cans/bottles in hand hurling abuse at all and sundry ?? It increases tension and aggression in public areas and is threatening , particularly for the Older generations.......sign this now to make it happen !!!
